back_flavor: Akira Hojo lived with his father who work as a doctor in an unstable country. When the ensuing chaos toke everything from him, he gathered other suffering childern together. With Chiaki Asami and few others, they fled the country. Only he and Chiaki managed to survive the journey. When he reached the safety of Arkham, he saw a warped city. He decided he would be the one to reform the criminal underbelly of Arkham. He vowed to he would turn these gangsters into a force that could protect Arkham from the anything, be it man or monster.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-4, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 15 Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-X where X is the number of tallies marks under Hojo's rank minus 2(max level 3). Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 Burning Ambition, 1 Occupational Hazard, 1 random basic weakness. Before drawing your opening hand: Set aside Burning Ambition. After Mulligan, shuffle Burning Ambition into the top 10 cards of your deck (top 5 cards if there are at least 6 tallies under Hojo's rank).
name: Akira Hojo
text: [reaction] When you perform a Fight action, spend 1 resource: Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed by 2 or more, you gain 1 resource (Limit once per test). [elder_sign] effect: +1. If this skill test causes an enemy to be defeated; gain 3 resources.

flavor:
"Why did you become a gangster?"
"Because you can do in a single day..."
name: Burning Ambition
text: Akira Hojo deck only. Fast. Uses (0 supplies). [reaction] After you pay any cost for a card effect, place 1 supply on Burning Ambition. Forced When there are at least 7 supplies on Burning Ambition: Search your bonded cards for Rite of Passage and swap it with Burning Ambition.

flavor: "...What it takes an ordinary man thirty years to do."
name: Rite of Passage
text: Bonded (Burning Ambition). Permanent. Forced After Rite of Passage enters play: Record 1 tally mark under “Hojo's Rank” in your Campaign Log. You get +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you succeed a skill test by 3 or more, exhaust Rite of Passage: Play an event card from your hand (paying its cost).

name: Occupational Hazard
text: Revelation Put Occupational Hazard into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn take 1 damage. If an ally is defeated this way, take 2 horror and discard Occupational Hazard.

back_flavor: Chiaki Asami was born in the Japanese Province of Owari. Though happy with his simple life, it would soon be take from him by the great Mino–Owari earthquake of 1891. Without an remaining family Chiaki immigrated to the United States, where he found himself settling down is the city of Arkham. Working from nothing, he would spend years founding his own company, set on creating a city like no other. It was only after some of his employees starting going missing and strange happening started appearing in the news that Chiaki learned the truth. If he didn't act now, Arkham would lead him to an early grave before he could see his plans for the city to completion.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 15 Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Foresight, Field Reports, Sleepless Nights, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Chiaki Asami
text: [reaction] When an investigator plays an event at your location: Reduce the cost that event by 1. If that event was an Insight and/or Science card, draw a card. (Limit once per round) [elder_sign] effect: +1. Reduce the cost of the next card played at your location by 1. I'll keep this city going even if I have to rebuild it from the ground up.

name: Political Pressure
text: Chiaki Asami's deck only. Uses (0 Policies). [reaction] After you reduce the cost of playing a card by at least 1 resource: Place 1 resource on this card as a Policy. Forced When there are at least 4 Policies on Political Pressure: Search your bonded cards for Referendum and swap it with Political Pressure.

name: Referendum
text: Bonded (Political Pressure). Permanent. Forced After Referendum enters play: Record 1 tally mark under “Asami's Influence” in your Campaign Log. [free] During the turn of another investigator at your location, reveal an event to them. They may play an event as if it were in their hand. If they trigger Chiaki Asami's "[reaction]" this way; they may draw a card instead of him (limit once per round).

flavor:
"Just what kind of man is he? How can
he walk around with a smile on his face?"
name: On Borrowed Time
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation Secretly add On Borrowed Time to your hand. Forced At the end of the investigator phase, if you played at least 2 event cards this round: Take 2 direct damage. Each investigator at your location takes 1 horror. Discard On Borrowed Time.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 15 Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Family Bonds, 2 copies of Prying Eyes, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Jack Myers
text:
Handlocked.
[reaction] When you play the left most card in your hand: Reduce the cost of that card by 1 for every 3 other cards in your hand (Limit once per round).
[elder_sign] effect: +1, if you succeed; draw a card and you may move a card in your hand up to 3 positions to the left or right.

name: Family Bonds
text:
Fast. Jack Myers Deck only.

Family Bonds does not count towards your maximum hand size. Ignore Family Bonds when determining your left most card in hand.
Move a non-weakness card in your hand up to 2 positions to the left or right. Draw a card. Shuffle this card into your deck (limit 2 played per round).

name: Prying Eyes
text: Discard all cards in your hand that were left of Prying Eyes before it was played. Forced While Prying Eyes is in your hand: Increase the cost of the first card played at your location each round by 1. Forced At the end of your turn: move Prying Eyes one position to the left.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: TEXT HERE Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): XX, XX, XX, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Alma Venandi

flavor:
"They plot evil schemes under the cover of darkness,
but the creatures of the night will not offer them any sanctuary."
name: Swarm of Bats
text:
Alma Venandi's deck only.

Enemies at your location have -1 evade.
[free] Exhaust Swarm of Bats and deal 1 damage to it:Move to Alma Venandi's location.

flavor:
"This feeling...Like something 
awful is about to happen!"
name: Ominous Shadows
text: Revelation Place Ominous Shadows into play in your threat area. It costs Investigators an additional action to leave your location. [action] Discard an Ally asset you control: Discard Ominous Shadows.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: TEXT HERE Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): XX, XX, XX, 1 random basic weakness.
name: William Grindwell

flavor: "For in that moment, we shall be as gods."
name: Future Foretold
text: Fast. Play at the start of the round. Until the end of the round, investigators get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], +1 [agility], and may take an additional action during their turn. Forced Whenever Future Foretold would enter your discard, place it on the top of your prophecy deck instead.

name: Star Spawn
text: Location farthest from all investigators. Hunter. After an investigator reveals an [eldersign] or [auto_fail] symbol during a skill test: Star Spawn attacks them (regardless of their location).
